## Welcome to [SARA](https://sara-edu.netlify.app/) Data Science Bootcamp! {.unnumbered}

[Quarto](https://quarto.org/) is a wonderful tool for publishing websites, theses, books, articles, and much more. We want your publications to be as beautiful and elegant as lotus flowers.

This is the website for the slides of the SARA Data Science Bootcamp - "Publish using Quarto." At SARA, we strongly believe in accessible data science education.

If you found our study materials useful, please give us a star on GitHub. 

<span style="text-shadow: none;"><a class="github-button" href="https://github.com/sara-institute/course-publish-quarto" data-icon="octicon-star" data-size="large" data-show-count="true" aria-label="Star this on GitHub">Star</a><script async defer src="https://buttons.github.io/buttons.js"></script></span>

Thank you for your support!

Email us at `sara.institute.info@gmail.com` $\cdot$ Call us at `925 315 2024`.
